errors.formattedMessage:
Warning: SPDX license identifier not provided in source file. Before publishing, consider adding a comment containing "SPDX-License-Identifier: <SPDX-License>" to each source file. Use "SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED" for non-open-source code. Please see https://spdx.org for more information.
--> contracts/Fundraising.sol
errors.message: SPDX license identifier not provided in source file. Before publishing, consider adding a comment containing "SPDX-License-Identifier: <SPDX-License>" to each source file. Use "SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED" for non-open-source code. Please see https://spdx.org for more information.

documentation.text:
mapping은 해쉬 테이블
 key : 기부한 사람의 주소
 value: 기부한 금액*

프로젝트 소유자가 모금하고자 하는 금액을 명시할 수 있도록 한다.
 When? 컨트랙이 배포될 때!*

외부에서 참조하는 함수라는 external
 payable은 돈을 받을 수 있음을 나타냄*
